Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.implementation.cli

Class CLIRenderer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Renderer
it.polimi.ingsw.view.implementation.cli.CLIRenderer
public class CLIRenderer
extends Renderer
Implementation of the Renderer for the CLI.
